name: Sage
description: The mind of a sage is filled with obscure lore gained through exhaustive research. This card represents well-intentioned advice.

person.upright: A person who offers helpful advice in difficult circumstances.
person.reverse: Someone who helpfully offers bad advice.

creatureTrap.upright: A helpful creature that leads the way to safety or a goal.
creatureTrap.reverse: A creature that tries to lead the way into danger or a trap.

place.upright: A place dedicated to knowledge and wisdom, such as a library or university.
place.reverse: A place whose structural flaws threaten its integrity.

treasure.upright: A valuable or magical book or scroll, or a sentient magic item that is known to provide helpful advice.
treasure.reverse: A device valuable for its components that doesn't function as intended, or a sentient magic item that provides bad but well-intentioned advice.

situation.upright: An opportunity to provide valuable advice on a familiar subject.
situation.reverse: An opportunity to provide advice on a completely unfamiliar subject.
